name: The Misty River
longDesc: The Misty River has water as white as milk and the bottom cannot be seen. The river stretches roughly East/West but because the river moves so slowly, you cannot tell which direction it flows. Leaves are scattered around the edge of the river bank. An iron gate and fence block the path leading to the river.
shortDesc: The white as milk Misty River stretches east/west. Leaves are scattered around the back, an iron fence and gate block the path leading to the river.
